animeDescription: "Netrun-mon THE MOVIE #1" is an original animation DVD conceived by Netrunner Magazine to celebrate their 5th birthday. This 30-min OVA is directed by Poyoyon Rock (of "Popotan" fame) and stars cute Netrunner characters Nin'i-tan and friends.   (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Iida Satoki', ['Sound Director']], ['Watanabe Akio', ['Character Design']], ['Revo', ['Music']], ['Hariganeya Hideo', ['Key Animation', 'Animation Director']]]
